alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 04 at 3:00AM PDT until October 04 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
